code: import React,{useState}from'react';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const TaskItem=_ref=>{let{task,toggleTaskCompletion,updateTask,deleteTask}=_ref;const[isEditing,setIsEditing]=useState(false);const[newName,setNewName]=useState(task.name);const handleUpdate=()=>{updateTask(task.id,newName);setIsEditing(false);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"flex items-center justify-between border-b py-2",children:[isEditing?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",value:newName,onChange:e=>setNewName(e.target.value),onBlur:handleUpdate,autoFocus:true,className:"border-gray-300 border p-2 mr-2"}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"flex items-center",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"checkbox",checked:task.completed,onChange:()=>toggleTaskCompletion(task.id),className:"mr-2"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"cursor-pointer ".concat(task.completed?'line-through':''),onClick:()=>toggleTaskCompletion(task.id),children:task.name})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"text-sm",children:task.dateTime}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"text-blue-500 mr-2",onClick:()=>setIsEditing(!isEditing),children:isEditing?'Save':'Edit'}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"text-red-600",onClick:()=>deleteTask(task.id),children:"Delete"})]})]});};export default TaskItem;
